item.description:
Hello All...

Friday 3pm to Sunday evening... more is optional...

Time for some camping, biking and campfires on the beach. I'll announce the exact location within a day or two. But that really doesnt matter at this point.  I have it down to two. Will get the exact one by monday. If anyone has a grill, lights any camping gear.. bring it along. We'll be near the cape cod rail trail so bring your bike and near the national sea shore so bring your bathing suit.

We need to get a number so please RSVP by wednesday. You can still come after that but we want to reserve the sites so we are together. I will forward the contact info so you can reserve your spot when I talk to the folks and figure out the exact process.

Hope to see you there !!!

 

UPDATE - Location is Maurice's Campground

we have two adjacent sites reserved. It will cost $30 per person if 8 people come. And they still have room for more if others want to join us.

If you say you are coming you owe me the money no matter what... got it?

Thanks for your understanding - NO NO SHOWS

Here is the website

http://www.mauricescampground.com/here.html
item.how_to_find_us: Ask for Roger Leary where you check in

group.name: South Shore Hike, Bike & Social Club

item.name: Camping In Wellfleet - Kids Welcome
